text: Over his nearly two - decade career, Nick Cannon has accomplished more than most celebrities — let alone former child stars — do in a lifetime. Cannon is a rapper, an actor, a comedian, a director, a screenwriter, and a radio and television personality. Whether it ’ s in the classic Drumline or the less classic Drumline : A New Beat, Cannon is always working. And while he ’ s always been a multitasker, the 36 - year - old has recently upped the ante when it comes to creative productivity. The star ’ s recent decision to part ways with America ’ s Got Talent has left Cannon with even more time to devote to his passion projects, like helming the Wild ’ N Out reboot at MTV and working on new music.
